title: Quarkus update fails with exception

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Exception problem with quarkus update, update fails.
Quarkus CLI 3.13.1, Java21, Gradle 8.9, MacOS 14.5

The code is proprietary so I can share only the most related pieces.

Repos:
```
pluginManagement {
    repositories {
        mavenLocal()
        mavenCentral()
        gradlePluginPortal()
    }
}
```

plugins:
```
plugins {
    id("java-library")
    id("java-test-fixtures")
    id("idea")
    alias(cp.plugins.kotlinJvm)
    id("org.jetbrains.kotlin.plugin.allopen") version libs.versions.kotlin.get() apply false
    alias(cp.plugins.kordampJavaProject)
    alias(cp.plugins.kordampJacoco)
    alias(cp.plugins.jacoco)
    alias(cp.plugins.jacocolog)
}

libs.versions.toml:
[versions]
java = "21"
kotlin = "2.0.0"
ksp = "2.0.0-1.0.21"
quarkus = "3.12.3"
kordamp = "0.54.0"

[plugins]
kotlinJvm = { id = "org.jetbrains.kotlin.jvm", version.ref = "kotlin" }
kotlinAllOpen = { id = "org.jetbrains.kotlin.plugin.allopen", version.ref = "kotlin" }
ksp = { id = "com.google.devtools.ksp", version.ref = "ksp" }
quarkus = { id = "io.quarkus", version.ref = "quarkus" }
kordampJavaProject = { id = "org.kordamp.gradle.java-project", version.ref = "kordamp" }
kordampJacoco = { id = "org.kordamp.gradle.jacoco", version.ref = "kordamp" }
jacoco = { id = "jacoco" }
jacocolog = { id = "org.barfuin.gradle.jacocolog", version = "3.1.0" }
gradle-git-properties = { id = "com.gorylenko.gradle-git-properties", version = "2.4.1" }
```

This is multi-project and multi-quarkus project solution.
I've tried to add these dependencies to `allprojects.dependency` section of root build.gradle.kts, but it didn't help
```
        implementation("org.apache.maven:maven-settings:3.9.8")
        implementation("org.apache.maven:maven-settings-builder:3.9.8")
        implementation("org.sonatype.plexus:plexus-sec-dispatcher:1.4")
        implementation("org.sonatype.plexus:plexus-cipher:1.7")
```

The error message:
```
> Task :paymentserver-quarkus:quarkusUpdate FAILED
quarkusUpdate is experimental, its options and output might change in future versions

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':paymentserver-quarkus:quarkusUpdate'.
> No matching bean available: type is interface org.apache.maven.settings.crypto.SettingsDecrypter
```

### Expected behavior

quarkus update works without exceptions

### Actual behavior

Exception is thrown when running quarkus update

```
* Exception is:
```

### How to Reproduce?

From the project root of java Gradle project with multi-subprojects, including Quarkus subprojects:
1. Run quarkus update on Mac, iTerm2 or Intellij Idea Ultimate
2. The exception is thrown

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin admins-MacBook-Pro.local 23.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 23.5.0: Wed May  1 20:09:52 PDT 2024; root:xnu-10063.121.3~5/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
